New Directors/New Films Festival

The New Directors/New Films festival highlights films by artists who are making their directorial debut

thearmnyc.com

Role

Concept, Design, Development, Interviewing

Team

Live Site

thearmnyc.com

This was a fun project to work on. We worked closely with the team at The Film Society at Lincoln Center to design a landing page and a full website that fits the tone of the festival.
